Package skeleton

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bone
    Bone entity represents a 3D position of the joint with respect to its parent
    BoneFunction
    Some static bone functions used in the project
    Chain
    Chain entity used to represent a set of points relation
    Node
    Node entity used for representing the vertices and some functionalities
    SkeletonExtraction
    Skeleton extraction algorithm with visible repulsive forece
    SkeletonRefine
    Refines the result of skeleton extraction
    SkeletonSystemGeneration
    Generates a bone system in hierarchy structure
